text:
Sure, Inc | https://sureapp.com | New York, NY or Santa Monica, CA | Full Time | $120-$180k

At Sure, our vision is to change the way billions of people interact with insurance. Our engineers are developing the experiences that will change how current and future generations protect their valuables. We're looking for team members who are big thinkers in all areas, including platform, mobile apps, artificial intelligence, and UI design.

We're looking to hire server and platform engineers who can oversee the design, development, and maintenance of our different backend product. You'll be a core member of the team working with the Product, Design, and Research teams to build and iterate on new features.

Roles: Server Engineer (Junior and Senior Level Roles Available)
